item.title: About
item.description: Hey there! This is an open source recipe website. Setup Some fun facts about the setup of this project include: Built with Quiqr and Hugo Hosted for free on GitHub Pages Developed using Vim, while listening to a variety of great tracks Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to open an issue on GitHub. Cheers üçí

item.title: French Sourdough Bread v1.0
item.description: I make this bread every day. It doesn’t take much of my time. About 10 minutes in the evening and 3 minutes in the morning. Before going to bed, I prepare the dough. First, I put water in the bread pan. Then the sourdough starter, followed by the flour, and finally the salt. The quantities may vary. Sometimes, while the bread machine is kneading, I add a bit more water or flour as needed.
